entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 24 with temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24 with temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:53 PM MST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14.
